sentences: Teenet osutama kõigepealt oma perele ja siis tööandjale.
Ta teenetas suuri auhindu oma panuse eest projektisse.
Kooli lõpetamise teenet on haridus, mis saadakse.
context: The Estonian word 'teenet' refers to merit, service, contribution, or deserved recognition/honor. It signifies something that is earned through effort and deserves acknowledgment. The dictionary definition shows it relates to being of benefit to someone (kellelegi suureks kasuks) and indirectly helping through one's actions oma käitumise v. tegevusega kellelegi kaasa aitama). It can refer to both individual achievements that deserve recognition and general service rendered to others.
